title: .NET Core Repositories Reference
body: .NET repositories (dotnet/dotnet, dotnet/core, dotnet/runtime) contain the core .NET implementation, runtime, and ecosystem. Includes C# language features, runtime optimizations, API documentation, performance benchmarks, and cross-platform compatibility information. Essential for .NET development best practices and understanding framework internals.
